forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady, heavy rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Heavy rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 53F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 38F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 37F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.
